channel.title: Buffer Reader - for Objects
channel.description:
hey mopars,
i need a buffer reader that read's my added object's from a .txt or .cfg file this is not the same as the object.cfg that's added in most client's i want a new one but i cant make buffer readers somehow :o
i want to add it into the file like this : [code]//Face: -3 = south | -2 = east | -1 = north | 0 = west //Type: 1 = Y + 1 | 2 = X + 1 | 3 = Y - 1 | 4 = X - 1 //--------x-------y-----ID-----ori-----type POH = 3214 3425 823 1 10 [ENDOFPOHLIST][/code]

item.title: Buffer Reader - for Objects
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

hey mopars,

i need a buffer reader that read’s my added object’s from a .txt or .cfg file
this is not the same as the object.cfg that’s added in most client’s i want a new one
but i cant make buffer readers somehow :o

i want to add it into the file like this :

//Face: -3 = south | -2 = east | -1 = north | 0 = west //Type: 1 = Y + 1 | 2 = X + 1 | 3 = Y - 1 | 4 = X - 1 //--------x-------y-----ID-----ori-----type POH = 3214 3425 823 1 10 [ENDOFPOHLIST]
